step1.para: Chock wheels.
Disconnect door remote control rod for access. Reposition and secure rod for access.
Remove engine cover.
Remove air filter pipe to turbo elbow hose.
Remove clamp retaining crankcase breather hose to valve cover. Remove turbo air elbow hose with crankcase breather hose.
Disconnect air y-pipe and exhaust pipe connections at turbo.
Loosen turbo exhaust pipe connections at exhaust manifolds.
Remove bolts retaining turbo to turbo exhaust pipe base.
Remove turbocharger with turbo mount pedestal base as one unit, include O-ring seal.
Remove turbocharger from pedestal base, include gasket and O-ring seal.
Clean pedestal mating surfaces.
Install turbocharger to pedestal mount base using new seals/gaskets.
Install turbocharger with mount base to engine. Use new seals.
Install turbo to turbo exhaust pipes mount base. Use new gasket.
Tighten turbo exhaust pipes at exhaust manifold connections.
Install air y-pipe and exhaust pipe connections at turbocharger.
Install crankcase breather hose. Use new hose clamp to secure. Connect turbocharger air intake elbow hose.
Install air filter pipe to turbo elbow hose.
Connect door remote control rod.
Start engine and check for leaks.
Install engine cover.
Remove wheel chocks.
